uselessJewelsMod:GemstoneAttack.NAME: Useless Gemstone
uselessJewelsMod:GemstoneAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
uselessJewelsMod:GemstoneAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

uselessJewelsMod:GemstoneSkill.NAME: Worthless Gemstone
uselessJewelsMod:GemstoneSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.
uselessJewelsMod:GemstoneSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Add a Worthless Gemstone into your hand. NL Exhaust. NL Ethereal.

uselessJewelsMod:GemstonePower.NAME: Pointless Gemstone
uselessJewelsMod:GemstonePower.DESCRIPTION: Increase the effects of all Gemstone cards by +!M! this combat. NL Ethereal.
